articles.title: Fears for European gas supplies as Ukraine cuts Russian exports - live updates - The Telegraph
articles.description: Fears over energy shortages mounted this morning after Ukraine said it will halt flows through a key entry point that delivers about a third of Russia’s gas supplies to Europe.
articles.content:
Good morning.
Gas prices have pushed higher amid a clash between Ukraine and Russia that threatens to disrupt a third of the fuel supplies delivered to Europe.
Ukraine said flows via one of two key… [+1950 chars]

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Ukraine makes gains near Kharkiv as Kyiv looks to pause the flow of Russian gas to Europe - ABC News
articles.description: Ukraine repels Russian advance near Kharkiv as Kyiv prepares to suspend some Russian gas flow to Europe blaming interference by Russian forces.
articles.content: Ukraine was preparing to suspend the flow of some Russian gas to Europe through a key transit point, as it claimed battlefield gains over invading Russian forces, including the recapture of four vill… [+6021 chars]

articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Zelenskiy says Ukraine forces pushing back Russia troops in Kharkiv - The Guardian
articles.description: President says military gradually pushing Russian troops away from key city as Ukraine’s gas operator says it will stop the flow of gas to Europe
articles.content: Ukraines government suggested that Kyiv could expand its own war aims with an intensifying counteroffensive against the Russians, and said it would suspend the flow of Russian gas through its country… [+5170 chars]

articles.title: COP15: Fulfil $19bn pledge to reduce migration to Europe, Buhari tells development partners - TheCable
